promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive legendary elephant electric-type pokemon with regal tusks. It can be found in city-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or elephant. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Electuskra, a a massive legendary elephant electric-type pokemon. It can be found in city-like environments It has the following abilities: Thunderous Bolt, Extreme Current. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "elephant", "electric" or "Electuskra". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, elephant-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, yellow and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This colossal titan, renowned as the guardian of skyscrapers, can unleash an explosive Thunderous Bolt. Known for controlling Extreme Currents, its rumble echoes across the city, embodying the living pulse of urban vibrance.
